channel.title: Is it possible for my friend to host with me?
channel.description: I would like to have my friend to be able to host our server without changing the client and webclient. Is it possible?

item.title: Is it possible for my friend to host with me?
item.dc:creator: @I_InDrEk_I I InDrEk I
item.description:
@I_InDrEk_I wrote:

Better use no-ip there it just automatically updates the ip for the host.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible for my friend to host with me?

item.title: Is it possible for my friend to host with me?
item.dc:creator: @frozon566 frozon566
item.description:
@frozon566 wrote:

serverâ€™s listen for incoming connections on the hosts computer, so if you run it the clients must connect to your IP and if your friend hosts it the clients must connect to your friends IP.

so in short, no, you must edit the IPs.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible for my friend to host with me?
